00010 #ifndef _CPPLOGGER_H_
00011 #define _CPPLOGGER_H_
00012 #include <ostream>
00013 #include <string>
00014 
00015 using std::string;
00016 
00069 class LogStream {
00070 public :
00072     enum LogType {
00073         TraceMessage,   
00074         DebugMessage,   
00075         InfoMessage,    
00076         WarningMessage, 
00077         ErrorMessage,   
00078         NoOutput        
00079     };
00080 
00081 public:
00084     static void SetPretext(const string &text);
00085 
00090     static void SetIndentLevel(int level);
00091 
00095     static void IncrementIndent(int number = 1);
00096 
00100     static void DecrementIndent(int number = 1);
00101 
00104     static void SetIndentSize(int size);
00105 
00110     static void SetAbortOnError(bool abort);
00111 
00116     static void SetLogTarget(const string &filename);
00117 
00122     static void SetLogLevel(LogType level);
00123 
00125     static void ClearLogFile();
00126 
00129     static bool GetAbortOnError();
00130 
00133     static void Test();
00134 
00135 public:
00141     LogStream(LogType type, bool endline, const string &file, int line);
00142 
00145     ~LogStream();
00146 
00155     template <typename T> LogStream& operator<<(const T &rhs);
00156 
00159     LogStream& operator<<(char* rhs);
00160 
00163     LogStream& operator<<(const char* rhs);
00164 
00167     LogStream& operator<<(string &rhs);
00168 
00171     LogStream& operator<<(const string &rhs);
00172 
00173 protected:
00174     bool _endline;  
00175     LogType _type;  
00176     string _file;   
00177     string _line;   
00178     bool _first;    
00180     std::ostream *_stream; 
00187     const string& replaceTags(const string &original, string &temp);
00188 
00192     void output(const string &format) {
00193         if (_type >= LogLevel) {
00194             if (!_first) {
00195                 (*_stream) << " ";
00196             }
00197 
00198             string temp;
00199             _first = false;
00200             (*_stream) << replaceTags(format, temp);
00201         }
00202     }
00203 
00204 protected:
00205     static string Logfile;      
00206     static string Pretext;      
00207     static bool AbortOnError;   
00208     static LogType LogLevel;    
00209     static int IndentLevel;     
00210     static int IndentSize;      
00212     static void TestPretext();
00213     static void TestLogTarget();
00214     static void TestLogLevel();
00215     static void TestClearFile();
00216     static void TestIndentLevel();
00217     static void TestTags();
00218 
00223     static void PrintAndCheckResult(char* string, LogType output = InfoMessage);
00224 
00228     static void CheckResult(char* string);
00229 
00233     static void AppendTimeString(string &timeless);
00234 
00235 };
00236 
00237 template <typename T> LogStream& LogStream::operator<<(const T &rhs) {
00238     if (_type >= LogLevel) {
00239         if (!_first) {
00240             (*_stream) << " ";
00241         }
00242 
00243         _first = false;
00244         (*_stream) << rhs;
00245     }
00246 
00247     return *this;
00248 }
00249 
00250 #ifndef TRACE_LEVEL
00251 #   define TRACE_LEVEL 2
00252 #endif
00253 
00254 #if TRACE_LEVEL < 1
00255 #   define Trace(a) LogStream(LogStream::TraceMessage, true, __FILE__, __LINE__) << a
00256 #else
00257 #   define Trace(a) do {} while(false)
00258 #endif
00259 
00260 #if TRACE_LEVEL < 2
00261 #   define Debug(a) LogStream(LogStream::DebugMessage, true, __FILE__, __LINE__) << a
00262 #else
00263 #   define Debug(a) do {} while(false)
00264 #endif
00265 
00266 #if TRACE_LEVEL < 3
00267 #   define Info(a) LogStream(LogStream::InfoMessage, true, __FILE__, __LINE__) << a
00268 #else
00269 #   define Info(a) do {} while(false)
00270 #endif
00271 
00272 #if TRACE_LEVEL < 4
00273 #   define Warn(a) LogStream(LogStream::WarningMessage, true, __FILE__, __LINE__) << a
00274 #else
00275 #   define Warn(a) do {} while(false)
00276 #endif
00277 
00278 #if TRACE_LEVEL < 5
00279 #   define Error(a) LogStream(LogStream::ErrorMessage, true, __FILE__, __LINE__) << a
00280 #else
00281 #   define Error(a) do {} while(false)
00282 #endif
00283 
00284 #endif
